com.llsx.pps.messaging

Interface MessageDispatcher


  • public interface MessageDispatcher
    Handles sending and receiving messages.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void receiveMessage(Message message)
      Triggers when the device receives a message.
      void sendMessage(Message message, boolean isCustomChannel)
      Sends out the message through the transport interface.
      void setTransportInterface(TransportInterface transportInterface)
      Sets the transport interface that will be used for transferring messages.

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(Message message,
               boolean isCustomChannel)
        Sends out the message through the transport interface.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be sent
        isCustomChannel - whether the message should be sent to a custom channel (true), or to the default channel (false)

      • receiveMessage

        void receiveMessage(Message message)
        Triggers when the device receives a message.
        Parameters:
        message - the message that was received

      • setTransportInterface

        void setTransportInterface(TransportInterface transportInterface)
        Sets the transport interface that will be used for transferring messages. In this case, it is the ChordTransportInterface.
        Parameters:
        transportInterface - transport interface to be used
